name: Conosco
description:
Conosco provides outsourced IT based on solid support and strategic thinking for London-based companies including Cadogan Estates, Dennis Publishing, Crabtree & Evelyn, Anya Hindmarch, Spencer House Partners and Issey Miyake. By blending cutting-edge IT solutions with expert consultancy, we provide you with an IT strategy designed around your business needs and objectives.
Our IT services provide comprehensive, fixed price, 24/7 support and have helped companies develop from start-ups into international brands.Â
